if Input.match("contains", "broma|Broma|BROMA", Context.get("currentMessage"), "") then
    local webhookResponse = Invoke.webhook("https://api.chucknorris.io/jokes/random", "GET", '')
    local joke = webhookResponse.value
    
    Context.set("broma", joke)
    Workflow.branch(96)
elseif Input.match("contains", "sheet|Sheet|SHEET", Context.get("currentMessage"), {}) then
    Invoke.webhook("https://hooks.zapier.com/hooks/catch/1227539/ox2s7mg/", "POST", '{"text":"Test from StudioNG"}')
    Workflow.branch(73)
else
    Workflow.branch(71)
end

Template.compile([[Para saber una broma de Chuck Norris, escribe broma

Escribe menu para regresar]])
